name: Lotasoft
description:
Lotasoft develops bespoke mobile and web applications for a variety of industries and verticals. Our solutions help businesses create new sales and marketing channels, boost revenue and brand loyalty while offering thousands of users exciting new ways of staying connected and informed about things that matter to them.
Our main directions:
○ Sports app development. We focus on sports app development to build best-in-class solutions for fitness, coaching, management of tournaments and leagues, fan entertainment, and much more — to help you accelerate the digital transformation of your business and gain a competitive edge over rivals. Whatever your goals are, we’re here to assist you.
○ IT-consulting. If you have not decided yet what technologies to use we can discuss your goal and provide the best solution. 
○ Web-services Development. We create awesome accessible web-services (Backend, Frontend) that open up great possibilities for your business. 
○ Mobile App development. We build the best iOS and Android applications (Native or Hybrids) from scratch which are ranked at the top of AppStore or Google Play. Our engineers have the highest qualification as software developers in Europe.
Feel free to let us know if you have any questions (costs, time estimation) about your project - we will be glad to help you (tell us that you are from the clutch.co - and we will calculate development time estimation of your project absolutely free).
